LanguageData.TiberiumRefinery.label: tiberium refinery
LanguageData.TiberiumRefinery.description: A specialized chemical refining plant. Used to refine lethal Tiberium into useful resources.
LanguageData.TiberiumRefinery_Blueprint.label: tiberium refinery (blueprint)
LanguageData.TiberiumRefinery_Frame.label: tiberium refinery (building)
LanguageData.TiberiumPowerPlant.label: Tiberium power plant
LanguageData.TiberiumPowerPlant.description: Produces power by consuming Tiberium fuel. Must be fueled by hand.
LanguageData.TiberiumPowerPlant_Blueprint.label: Tiberium power plant (blueprint)
LanguageData.TiberiumPowerPlant_Frame.label: Tiberium power plant (building)
